messages.content:
They forgot to ship the ~~box~~ package. But _that_ is **no problem**, I will go pick it up this afternoon! In the meantime, can you check for me:

* The tracking number
* Its current location

formatted.content:
They forgot to ship the box package. But that is no problem, I will go pick it up this afternoon! In the meantime, can you check for me:

  • The tracking number
  • Its current location

messages.content:
Haha yes! I'll keep calm for sure.

In the meantime, and before I forget, you asked me for some brand assets. Here they are, but you can also find them at: [Crisp website](https://crisp.chat/), https://crisp.chat/en/ or crisp.chat and even email them at: contact@crisp.chat

messages.content:
I'm sharing a backtrace I just saw on the XMPP server:

```
&> Feb 13 20:43:50 modulemanager   error   Error initializing module 'storage_sql' on 'proxy.ssk.pm': /usr/share/lua/5.1/pr
osody/util/startup.lua:203: module 'DBI' not found:No LuaRocks module found for DBI
        no field package.preload['DBI']
        no file './prosody/DBI.lua'
        no file './DBI.lua'
        no file '/usr/local/share/lua/5.1/prosody/DBI.lua'
        no file '/usr/local/share/lua/5.1/DBI.lua'
```

Can someone have a look at it? [@Valerian Saliou](xmpp:valerian@prose.org)

messages.content:
I am testing some ~~Markdown there~~, don't _mind me_... üòá

---

**The developer said:**

1. Thank you for reporting this bug.
2. I however do not have time to fix this...
3. Maybe, you should do it!

# This is huge!
## This is big!
### This is medium!
#### This is small!
##### This is smaller!
###### This is tiny!

Can you look at this code `instance` please?
I need a reply quick.

Enjoy your weekend!
